description: Try our easy to follow Pear Tarte Tatin recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pear Tarte Tatin Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 sheet frozen ready rolled shortcrust pastry

recipeInstructions.text: Stand for 5 minutes before inverting onto a serving plate. Serve immediately with ice-cream.
